item.name: Aegis of the Abyss
entries: Once the tool of the Abyssal Guard, an elite force of mage hunters, following their decline their weapons and armor became some of the most sought after in the world. This broad silvered shield is adorned with a grotesque face. Its fanged open mouth contains swirling arcane energies.

entries.name: Spellguard
entries: While holding this Shield, you have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and spell attacks have disadvantage against you.

entries.name: Arcane Hunger
entries: As a reaction you can make the shield absorb a ranged spell attack, if the target of the spell is within 10 feet of you. You can use this feature twice per long rest. If a single spell deals more than 90 damage the shield, it shatters.

item.name: Amulet of the Frog
entries: This amulet, shaped like a tree frog, features two large emeralds where its eyes should be.

entries.name: Leapfrog
entries: This amulet can be used to cast the spell {@spell jump} twice per long rest.

entries.name: Amphibious Comfort
entries: {@b Amphibian.} When attuned to this amulet, you gain a movement speed equal to your walking speed (if you don't have one already).

entries.name: Knowledge of the Swamp
entries: If a {@class druid} attunes to this necklace, they gain the following beast shapes: {@creature rat}, {@creature raven}, {@creature giant rat}, {@creature poisonous snake}, {@creature stirge}, {@creature constrictor snake}, {@creature giant frog}, {@creature giant lizard}, {@creature giant poisonous snake}, {@creature crocodile}, {@creature giant spider}, {@creature giant toad}, {@creature giant constrictor snake}, and {@creature giant crocodile}.

item.name: Band of the Firm Grip
entries: This golden ring is designed with two hands interlacing their fingers on one side, adorned with a small blue gem on either hand.

entries.name: Helping Hand
entries: This ring allows the wearer to cast {@spell mage hand} at will.

entries.name: Firm Grip
entries: This ring has 10 charges. As an action, the wearer may expend charges to cast the following spells: {@spell hold person} at 2nd level (3 charges), {@spell hold monster} at 5th level (5 charges), and {@spell Bigby's hand} at 5th level (10 charges). The ring regains {@dice 1d10} spent charges at dawn.

item.name: Band of the Firm Grip (Cursed)
entries: This golden ring is designed with two hands interlacing their fingers on one side, adorned with a small red gem on either hand.

entries.name: Helping Hand
entries: This ring allows the wearer to cast {@spell mage hand} at will.

entries.name: Firm Grip
entries: This ring has 10 charges. As an action, the wearer may expend charges to cast the following spells: {@spell hold person} at 2nd level (3 charges), {@spell hold monster} at 5th level (5 charges), and {@spell Bigby's hand} at 5th level (10 charges). The ring regains {@dice 1d10} spent charges at dawn (when the curse is removed).

entries.name: Hold Tight (Curse)
entries: Some {@i bands of the firm grip} are cursed, and attuning to them extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with {@spell remove curse} or similar magic (or by severing the finger it is worn on), this item clasps painfully around your finger and is unable to be removed or unattuned. Despite this, you are unwilling to part with this ring until the curse is broken.
While this item is cursed, it loses {@dice 1d4} charges upon attunement and cannot regain expended charges.

item.name: Blackout Candle
entries: This matte black candle is cool to the touch, even when placed in a warm environment.

entries.name: Pitch Black
entries: While this candle is lit, magical darkness spreads from the candle in a 20-foot radius sphere for 5 hours (per the {@spell darkness} spell). The darkness spreads around corners.

A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and non-magical light can't illuminate it. Completely covering the candle with an opaque object, such as a bowl or a helm, blocks the darkness. If any of the candle's area of effect overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell that created the light is dispelled.

item.name: Blade of the Empire
entries: This broad-bladed {@item shortsword +1|dmg} was created to aid the Imperial soldiers in battle against the forces of the Abyss.

entries.name: Military Precision
entries: You receive a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this weapon.

entries.name: Lawkeeper
entries: If you are of a Lawful alignment you deal an extra {@damage 1d6} slashing damage to creatures with a Chaotic alignment whenever you make a successful attack using this sword.

entries.name: Trip
entries: Bolas are mainly used to trip foes from a distance. A Large or smaller bipedal creature hit with bolas must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 15) or be {@condition restrained}. A restrained creature may attempt to break free with a successful Strength (Athletics) check (DC 15). A creature can also try to untangle the bolas using a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check (DC 12).

item.name: Boom-erang
entries: This simple boomerang is carved from ebony wood, with runes lining the outer edge.

entries.name: Returning
entries: When you throw the boom-erang you can catch it in the same round as part of the attack, or you can choose to catch it in the following round as a bonus action. If the boom-erang is thrown further than 60 feet you may only catch it in the following round.

entries.name: Arcane Blast
entries: When you make a successful attack with this weapon you can choose to activate a blast of arcane energy centered on your target. Each creature in a 10-foot radius must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 15). On a failed save the target takes {@damage 2d6} force and {@damage 2d4} fire damage, or half damage on a successful save. You can use this feature up to two times per long rest.
